players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Oh no, Charlie is dead! This is terrible. We need to be careful and figure out who did this."
Bob: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We should vote her out immediately."
You: "I think Bob might be mistaken. We should gather more information before making accusations."
Diana: "I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He is the mafioso trying to frame me. Vote Bob!"
Bob: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and she is mafia. Alice, trust me and vote Diana to win."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
